Overview: Raghu, a normal college guy gets dragged into trouble when he falls in love with Lekha and their whirlwind romance changes the course of his life.
A brilliant and short-tempered young surgeon goes down a self-destructive path when the love of his life is forced to marry another man.
A recently released prisoner becomes involved in a chase with criminals as he races against time to drive poisoned cops to hospital in exchange for meeting his daughter.
A former football player struggles to train a women's football team and avenge his father's death.
The guy and his cousin fall for each other but separate due to ego clashes. Years later, when their grandmother falls ill, they are forced to confront each other.

The teenage son of a farmer from an underprivileged caste kills a rich, upper caste landlord. Will the farmer, a loving father and a pacifist by heart, be able to save his hot-blooded son is the rest of the story.
A Special Protection Group officer has to identify the threat to the prime minister, who he is protecting, and also the nation.
Two long-separated brothers end up in life-threatening situations. How do their lives intersect and what happens next?
An undercover cop becomes embroiled in a battle with warring criminals who want to acquire a "black box," their ultimate key to a treasure.
A site engineer, who suffers from night blindness, gets into trouble when he is mistaken for the leader of a protest group by a goon. His life becomes even more complicated after he falls in love.
A man develops friendship with a camel, and has to embark on a journey with the animal.
A kabaddi team faces several struggles while competing in a national-level championship.
A youngster in his mid-30s goes through a series of struggles after coming to terms with the fact that he was in coma for 16 years.
When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.
Two smart con-women and a bunch of quirky gangsters are pitted against each other while in pursuit of a mythical vessel fabled for its powers.
The life of a casteist girl, who wants to get married to a goon, becomes a roller-coaster ride after she realises that she's with the wrong person.
A free-spirited girl gets the shock of her life when she finds herself naked in an abandoned building after a late-night party.
Vasu, a young medico, after rescuing one of his patients from a murder attempt finds out that his pregnant wife is abducted, and the kidnappers demand the patient he saved in exchange for her safety.
A street racer and a traffic cop end up becoming brothers-in-law. Can they accept each other given their previous hostile history?
The security guard of a mall, who belongs to the Gurkha community, becomes the saviour of several people who have been kept under siege by some terrorists.
The son of a disgraced kabaddi player realises his father's dream of helping his team, Vennila Kabadi Kuzhu, win the title in a kabaddi tournament.
A man visits his friends a day before his wedding and ends up taking a potent drug. How does this change his life?
An irresponsible guy locks horns with one of his relatives in a election.

Story of a rural Government school headmistress, who saves the school from its decline and reforms the same by handling the hindrances from private school owners, Govt. officials, politicians and even her colleagues.

After jinxed romantic affair, a brilliant man with his friend plans to steal from his landlady. After pulling the theft successfully , he is shocked by strange coincidences of happenings in his family and the landlady.
Lord Shiva accuses Yama for saving the life of a criminal-politician when the latter tries to stop a little girl from dying. Yama is given a few days' time to rectify his action.
An elderly couple, a house wife and a retired army man, go through some unanticipated moments during a rainy season in Chennai.
It's a story of a common man Thiru who ventures out from his comfort zone looking to make money and becomes Sindhubaadh.
Two painters and a photographer try to stop a forest officer from poaching a tiger.
A nyctophobic woman has to fight her inner demons to stay alive in the game called life.
A man on a murder spree meets his match in a brilliant police officer, and a cat-and-mouse game ensues.
An educated do-gooder is forced to enter politics in order to serve the society. But, will the old guard make way and allow him to do that?
A doting wife goes through a hard time trying to save her husband who is possessed by two spirits.
A shape-shifting snake-woman, who is in search of her lover, who she lost two decades ago, sets out to win his love again.
A corrupt police officer finds his life changing when he takes on a case of gang rape.
A man falls in love with a girl and tries to impress her. However, their life takes a serious turn when they fall victim to cyber-bullying.
An inebriated filmmaker finds himself in a shocking situation when he realises that the mysterious girl who accompanied him to her room has been killed.
A happy-go-lucky guy lands in trouble after he locks horns with an egoistic lady. Both of them try to outsmart each other during various situations.
A young cop, who works in a police control room, tries to solve the mysterious case of a kidnapped girl.
A retired cop from India while on a trip to USA solves a series of clueless crimes in his neighborhood, relying only on his power of reasoning.
A music shop owner falls in love with a girl from a circus troupe that has come to his village. But caste and class stand in the way.
A young man who gets easily scared is possessed by a ghost that is seeking revenge.
A day before his engagement, a man is threatened by a local goon over a debt which he owes him.
A woman who loses her husband in a police encounter plots to take revenge on the gangsters who had framed him.
A man leads an agitation against corrupt politicians and an unethical businessman whose factory has released toxic gas into the air, resulting in a tragedy.
Set against the backdrop of a slum in Chennai, the movie is about the relationships between a few slum dwellers and how some anti-social elements create unrest in their lives.
An international hockey player who has chosen to leave the sport picks it up again to save the ground of a local team.

An unfaithful newly-wed wife, an estranged father, a priest and an angry son suddenly find themselves in the most unexpected predicaments, each poised to experience their destiny, all on one fateful day.

A young woman, who goes to her grandmother's home in Pollachi, realises the presence of something supernatural in the place. Meanwhile, mysterious murders are happening in Chennai. How are these seemingly unrelated events connected?
A cop is after a powerful politician after gathering ample evidences against the latter for murdering a journalist.
An unemployed youngster is at the crossroads, puzzled about choosing between family and love.
The relationship between a guy and a girl becomes complicated when the latter gets tired of the former's impatient behaviour.
A kidnapping gone wrong leads to mounting tension between Prabha, the kidnapper, and Kathir, the policeman assigned to the case.
A guy who gets a face transplant done, following a fire accident, realises many are after his life. He sets out to find the reason for the same.
The murder of a youngster creates confusion among cops when they discover the suspect has a lookalike.
Four girls, who are bored of their mundane lives, get a new lease of life when they befriend a practical and progressive girl.
A small-time politician dreams of becoming Chief Minister.
The young heir of a rich family sets out to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.
Due to the black magic protecting Maya, anyone who falls in love with her ends up mysteriously killed, so Vijay tries to get rid of the magic.

Dev, a youngster from a well-to-do family, is an adventure seeker. When his friend playfully tries to set him up with Meghna, a businesswoman who has no time for love, Dev has to embark on an adventure of another kind.
A marriage is in the verge of trouble as the groom sends an abusive message to the bride under the influence of alcohol. Will he able to save the wedding?
Though he works as a hostel warden, there is more to Kaali than meets the eye. Things take an interesting turn when Kaali's path crosses with a group of dreaded gangsters.
A village ruffian, who settles disputes in his native, takes on a big shot when he tries to sort out the rough patch in his marriage after several years.
A single father tries to raise his daughter, who has cerebral palsy, even as she is beginning to wake up to her sexuality.
Gangster Maari squares off against Beeja, a hardened criminal who considers himself to be the God of death.
A sincere cop suspended from the department for locking horns with a few influential people in the society, starts taking revenge against those who finished off his dear ones.
A woman who hails from a middle-class family background aims to excel in the competitive world of cricket with the help of her supportive father.
Seethakaathi is a story, that chronicles the journey of Ayya, a legendary stage performer. The film showcases how an artiste and his art are immortal.
An encounter specialist's success in hunting down and eliminating criminals takes him to the holy city of Rameshwaram, where he will face the biggest threat of his career.
An encounter specialist's success in hunting down and eliminating criminals takes him to the holy city of Rameshwaram, where he will face the biggest threat of his career.
After mobiles start mysteriously flying out of the hands of people in Chennai, Dr Vaseegaran summons his trusted robot Chitti to ward off the bird-shaped supernatural powers of Pakshirajan.

An NRI businessman learns his vote has been cast by someone else and decides to investigate the matter, eventually finding himself pitted against two corrupt politicians.
Balu and his father have to protect a young man from a woman who has sworn vengeance on his entire clan.

A husband and wife, who are poles apart, go through a lean patch after they start living separately.

The son of Aarusaamy becomes a cop and takes on the criminal who murdered his parents.
